fields.text: Welcome to Homebase, the San Francisco-based solution for free employee scheduling, timesheets, time clocks, and hiring support.
For assistance with scheduling, timesheets, or time clock questions, press '[INDEX]'.
For help creating or adjusting your employee schedule, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to a scheduling specialist.
For questions about timesheet entries or clock-in issues, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you with a timekeeping expert.
For help with hiring, recruiting, or onboarding new staff, press '[INDEX]'.
For posting job openings and tracking applicants, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our recruitment team.
For onboarding guidance and hiring process support, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we route your call to our hiring support specialists.
